original_title: Kleiner Rabe Socke - Der Rabe findet einen Namen
overview: Summary  The little Raven wants to have a real name. The whole night he thinks about it and even gets sick of it. So sick that he feels very miserable. But then his friends help him to find a suitable name ... The popular stories of the Little Raven Sock are about dealing with personal weaknesses and strengths and, above all, about friendship.
title: Kleiner Rabe Socke - Der Rabe findet einen Namen
